SELECT p.`id` AS id, pt.`id` AS pt_id, pt.`name` AS pt_name, p.`id` AS p_id, p.`product_type_id` AS p_product_type_id, p.`code` AS p_code, p.`name` AS p_name, p.`unit_name` AS p_unit_name, p.`unit_price` AS p_unit_price, FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON p.`product_type_id` = pt.`id`
p.`id` = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT p.`id` AS id, pt.`id` AS pt_id, pt.`name` AS pt_name, p.`id` AS p_id, p.`product_type_id` AS p_product_type_id, p.`name` AS p_name, p.`unit_name` AS p_unit_name, p.`unit_price` AS p_unit_price, pa.`id` AS pa_id, pa.`product_id` AS pa_product_id, pa.`amount` AS pa_amount, pa.`store_id` AS pa_store_id, s.`id` AS s_id, s.`name` AS s_name FROM product_amount pa LEFT JOIN store s ON pa.`store_id` = s.`id` LEFT JOIN product p ON pa.`product_id` = p.`id` LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON p.`product_type_id` = pt.`id`
pa.`id` = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
